committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to eliminate automatic cost-of-living adjustments of salaries of Members of the Congress and certain executive and judicial employees.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to repeal automatic cost-of-living adjustments for Members of Congress. Abolishes such adjustments for (1) certain executive and judicial employees and officials, (2) the Vice President, and (3) referees in bankruptcy.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate automatic cost-of-living adjustments of salaries of Members of the Congress and certain executive and judicial employees.
